alert.note: Alert for Surry; Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Surry, southeastern Wilkes and western Yadkin Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Wilkesboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Wilkesboro... Elkin... Wilkesboro... Jonesville... Ronda... Boomer... and Windy Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia.
